channel.title: Pi please help
channel.description:
I got a question, how can i change player look when player logs in like, he just logs in but i can set the look how basically all new players looks after logging in.?
Please help me.

item.title: Pi please help
item.dc:creator: @iHype iHype
item.description:
@iHype wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:1, topic:450465”]I got a question, how can i change player look when player logs in like, he just logs in but i can set the look how basically all new players looks after logging in.?

Please help me.[/quote]

instead of going through all the trouble of adding an interface when the player logs in, why not just add a makeover-mage?
this way you save time. And it’s much easier.

Read full topic
